Medium shot from Mr. Bean 1990s British cartoon show, exaggerated slapstick comedy animation style. Framing Mr. Bean from waist up standing at kitchen counter, completely covered in egg splatter dripping from face, glasses, jacket and tie. The camera is static as he stands frozen in shock, mouth hanging open in perfect O-shape, eyes wide behind egg-covered glasses. He slowly wipes one lens with his index finger, smearing the egg worse. He looks down at the mess on his brown tweed jacket, touches the wet yolk with fingertip, examines it with disgust. He looks at the empty white bowl on counter with no egg in it. He looks back at his egg-covered hand. His facial expression cycles through shock, frustration, resignation with deep exhale and shoulders slumping. He carefully peels a large piece of white shell from his eyebrow, holds it up examining it closely, flicks it away off-screen. Audio: egg dripping plop plop plop hitting floor and counter, deep frustrated sigh "haaahhhh", mumbled British muttering "bloody typical...".
